identity.name: Alejandro Rubio
bio: I am a Computer Science Student at Texas Tech University who enjoys building AI systems, experimenting with low-level software,

and turning ideas into machine code for all to use. I like keeping things practical, creative, and human—whether that’s designing intelligent assistants or exploring how systems really work under the hood.
When I am not coding, I am melting faces off in my deathcore band Septilith.
identity.quote: 'The future is not a river to carry us. It is the ocean in which we drown, if we are not prepared' - Darth Vitiate
